title: Switch MCP health checks from HTTP to TCP connect

comment: PRE-REVIEW: COMPLIANT. All 12 required CR sections present and substantive. Frontmatter verified: title="Switch MCP health checks from HTTP to TCP connect", revision_summary="Initial draft" (acceptable for v0.1 executable document). No placeholder content in pre-approved sections (1-9). Execution sections (10-11) contain expected execution-phase placeholders. No typos, formatting errors, or TBD/TODO/FIXME markers found. Traceability to CR-088 and governing SOPs confirmed. EI table correctly structured with pre/post baseline commits per SOP-004 Section 5, and VR flag on EI-2 for integration verification. SDLC prerequisites N/A (Agent Hub is not SDLC-governed). No TU assignment required -- affected domain (Agent Hub service management) is outside all TU specializations (tu_ui, tu_scene, tu_sketch, tu_sim). Recommend for pre-approval.
